message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering the product to you for $9000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $8200. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. However, I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8800. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8400. I think this is the best we can do for both of us.

I understand that we're getting close, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering the product to you for $8200. This is the best I can do.
